Question
========

An impure coin is tossed 3 times. The probability of heads up is 0.6. What is the probability of heads up exactly 2 times?

Answerlist
----------

* 0.144
* 0.36
* 0.432

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.144: Incorrect
* 0.36: Incorrect
* 0.432: Correct
